price: ሰይጣንም ወደርሱ ጎተጎተ «አደም ሆይ! በመዘውተሪያ ዛፍ በማይጠፋ ንግሥናም ላይ ላመላክትህን? አለው፡፡
arabic: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shayṭānu qāla yāādamu hal adulluka ʿalā shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin lā yablā
